coded_answer.p: Thank you very much for your letter and for this competition.

First I would like to answer your questions. I am only available onin July, is. Is itthat fineokay for you? BecauseThis is because, the only time I can take a holiday is July. I would prefer log cabins,. I think they are more comfortable and safer than tents.

AboutRegarding the two activities, I choose swimming and painting. I choose swimming because I am very good at swimming and I like it very much. I took swimming courseslessons for four years. And the reason I choose painting is it's beingit's very exciting tofor me,. I am not very good at this subject but I wouldwill improve my painting.

I would like to ask whatherwhether you have competitions or different activities?. Do you reccomendrecommend me to take only summer clothes or some winter clothes as well? Is it a very expensive area? I mean would Â£700 be enough for me for one week?
Thank you very much for your interest.
I look forward to hearing from you.
It's been a long time notsince I to writewrote to you,. I'm really sorry but I was very busy. I worked untilluntil midnight everydayevery day.
Actually I don't work, you know,. I hadhave been decorating a concert hall for a pop concert. It was very important for us because we really wanted people to enjoy it.

It was very enjoyable. I metmade lots of friends. We'd beenWe were together all day, painting the walls, cleaning and putting up some baloonsballoons and other staffstuff everywhere. And at the time of the concert we wore a big funny costumecostumes, and danced with people. Everybody liked it very much,. Anyway we worked for that.

The most I likeWhat I liked most was meeting with the band. Guess what the name of the band is; Back Street Boys. Oh, my God, they're sosuch nice, talkative, funny, people. But you know they're a bit spoilt.
I have to finish or I'll miss the last post.
Bye for now, write to me soon
